block.p: * Cristian Dobles was named to the new post of executive creative director at HispanAmerica, New York, a division of the Rapp Collins Worldwide unit of the Omnicom Group. He had been executive creative director and managing director at the Hispanic division of the Uniworld Group, New York. * Michael Megalli, senior consultant at Siegelgale, New York, was named to the additional post of director for a new broadband and wireless group.
